item.description:
I saw this at the Palm Springs International Film Festival this year.  This is a great film about revenge and police work in Europe.  The side you don't see that often. The film starts at 2:00 pm.

Winner of several film festival awards, this hard hitting crime thriller reunites the buddy cops from "The Alzheimer Case".  A young Albanian on a mission to avenge his father's murder squares up against a lovesick cop, who is trying to stop the blood feud.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lower lobby wearing a yellow jacket (if you don't know who I am).

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Belgium Film - "Dossier K"
